member.name: D3D11_VIDEO_DECODER_BEGIN_FRAME_CRYPTO_SESSION.pCryptoSession
member.summary: A pointer to the ID3D11CryptoSession interface. To get this pointer, call .

member.name: D3D11_VIDEO_DECODER_BEGIN_FRAME_CRYPTO_SESSION.BlobSize
member.summary: The size of the memory buffer referenced by the pBlob member.

summary.para: The definition of this buffer is dependent on the implementation of the secure execution environment. It could contain a sealed key blob or any other per-key data that the secure execution environment needs to pass to the decode API.
The definition of this buffer is dependent on the implementation of the secure environment. It may contain data specific to the current frame.

member.name: D3D11_VIDEO_DECODER_BEGIN_FRAME_CRYPTO_SESSION.pKeyInfoId
member.summary: A pointer to a GUID identifying the hardware key.

member.name: D3D11_VIDEO_DECODER_BEGIN_FRAME_CRYPTO_SESSION.PrivateDataSize
member.summary: The size of the memory buffer referenced by the pPrivateData member.
